title: Bigg Boss 13 To Have A Surprise Midnight Eviction Tonight, Siddharth Dey Is Reportedly Out!
text:
This week was quite tumultuous in Bigg Boss 13. Fights, arguments, violence and much more – the Snake and Ladder task was highly controversial. So much so, that all contestants were nominated for sabotaging the task and Salman Khan lashed out at everyone.

Twitter

Because of Diwali, however, there were no evictions during the weekend, but if the latest reports are to be believed, there will be a surprise eviction tonight.

Whom do you want to see evicted in the Midnight Eviction - which is normally unceremonious🤣

Predict the one who will be evicted!!!#BB13 #WeekendKaVaarWithSalmanKhan — The Khabri (@TheKhbri) October 27, 2019

In the surprise midnight eviction, it is suspected that Siddhartha Dey will be eliminated.

Siddhartha Dey had only ruffled feathers in his journey in Bigg Boss 13 by saying inappropriate things to women including Arti Singh and Shehnaz Gill. Apart from that, his dancing moves kept viewers entertained.

Don't Miss 487 SHARES 291 SHARES 14.4 K SHARES 1.9 K SHARES

Voot

Next week, Bigg Boss 13 will witness its first finale. Half of the remaining contestants will be evicted, Salman Khan had said in the recent episode.

Instagram

What’s more? New contestants aka wild card entries have already entered the house. Tehseen Poonawalla, Vikas Pathak aka Hindustani Bhau and Khesari Lal Yadav are the new entries in the Bigg Boss 13 house.
description: Because of Diwali, however, there were no evictions during the weekend in Bigg boss 13, but if the latest reports are to be believed, there will be surprise eviction tonight. In the surprise midnight eviction, it is suspected that Siddhartha Dey will be eliminated.
